pageProduct.name: Provoke Touch Of Silver Colour Care Shampoo 1000ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

PRO:VOKE Touch Of Silver Colour Care Shampoo prevents colour build-up and dulling for beautiful, healthy hair everyday of the week.

Common Uses

Containing anti-oxidants and Optical Brighteners, this Shampoo instantly boosts shine and keeps hair colour bright, resulting in healthy hair that feels fresh and rejuvenated. Its gentle cleansing formula also helps to protect against environmental pollution to safeguard your colour.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, Wheat Amino Acids, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Betaine, Polyquaternium-59, Quaternium-91, Butylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polyquaternium-39, Keratin, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Panthenol, Parfum (Fragrance), Disodium Distyrylbiphenyl Disulfonate, EDTA, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Citric Acid, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Acid Violet 43

Directions

Apply to wet hair and massage into a gentle lather.Apply to wet hair and massage into a gentle lather.
Rinse thoroughly. Best used in between washes with the Brightening Shampoo.
